channel.title: ZodiacsReign Package "Lite" 1.0
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i41.tinypic.com/1118bhl.jpg[/img] [size=20pt][i]ZodiacsReign™ Lite™[/i][/size]
Welcome, again to the ZodiacsReign topic. I've decided to release a [i]Lite[/i] version of the package for people who don't have a proper connection to download big files. If you have already downloaded the original packages then this wouldn't be any different besides the features.
[b]NOTE : I had to remove the shop-maker made by Jaywalker because it showed up as a virus for most of you. I have went on and on about how it was not a virus. but i continued to get nothing but flame because of that certain tool.
Features - [b]317 ID list - Item List - Npc List - Emote List - Object List - Interface List - Graphics List - Coordinates List - And More
[b]508 ID list - Sounds List - Items List - Npc List - Colors List - Emotes List
[b] "Lite" Tools Item Re-namer Command Generator Auto Restarter Auto-spawn Generator Server - Item - Wipe
And More
[size=15pt]Download Link[/size] http://www.mediafire.com/?dyjmtmmjkmf 2.83MB
Credits - Galkon - His help ZDiddyReloaded - His source Cocoa - His help Jagex - Dont know. Delta - Source WinterLove - Source Google - Dont know. Voule - Tools.
[img]http://www.mediafire.com/free-file-hosting/mediafire-swoosh.gif[/img] [Img]http://i26.tinypic.com/5o8jf4.jpg[/img] [img]http://i25.tinypic.com/2rdvlo2.jpg[/img]
Virus Scan provided by Cocoa since my norton scans are critisized [img]http://i26.tinypic.com/331hyf6.png[/img]
[/center]

@Z_0_D_I_A_C wrote:

[center]
[size=20pt]ZodiacsReign™ Lite™[/size]

Welcome, again to the ZodiacsReign topic. I’ve decided to release a Lite version of the package for people who don’t have a proper connection to download big files. If you have already downloaded the original packages then this wouldn’t be any different besides the features.

[b]NOTE : I had to remove the shop-maker made by Jaywalker because it showed up as a virus for most of you. I have went on and on about how it was not a virus. but i continued to get nothing but flame because of that certain tool.

Features -
